title: Brazil : voting intention for 2018 presidential elections , by candidate
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Share of respondents on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
Over the 30 Months, the Share of respondents for Situation A have been reduced whereas climbed for Month.

Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Situation A. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Month Don't know for Situation A.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Don't know had the biggest gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Situation A.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Share of respondents on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the Share of respondents for Situation A have reduced. On the other hand, for Month the Share of respondents have climbed.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Share of respondents on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
Over the 30 Months, the Share of respondents for Situation A have been reduced whereas climbed for Month.

Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Situation A. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Month Don't know for Situation A.
Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Don't know had the biggest gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Situation A.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Share of respondents on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
Over the 30 Months, the Share of respondents for Situation A have been reduced whereas climbed for Month.
Out of all 2 groups, Situation A had the highest Share of respondents for Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Situation A had the lowest Share of respondents for Month Don't know.
For Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest Share of respondents among all 30 Months and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Month Don't know.
The maximum Share of respondents for Situation A that was found in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) was 39.0 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Month Don't know.
Among the groups, Situation A had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 39.0 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.

On average, the Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) had the highest Share of respondents for all 2 groups Situation A, and Situation B. Whereas João Goulart Filho (PPL) had the lowest average Share of respondents.

data.Month: Blank or voided ballots / No vote
